sourcesContent:
import { LCDClient, MnemonicKey } from '@terra-money/terra.js'; import { Card, Row, Col, CardTitle, CardBody, CardText, Button, Form, FormGroup, Label, Input, Table, } from "reactstrap"; import luna from "../../../assets/images/logos/luna.jpg"; //import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; const MNE_KEY_RANDOM = new MnemonicKey(); const terra = new LCDClient({ URL: 'https://lcd.terra.dev', chainId: 'columbus-5' }); const wallet = terra.wallet(MNE_KEY_RANDOM); // ANC on bombay-12 const tokenAddress = 'terra1747mad58h0w4y589y3sk84r5efqdev9q4r02pc'; const response = terra.wasm.contractQuery(tokenAddress, { balance: { address: MNE_KEY_RANDOM.accAddress }}); console.log(response); const tableData = [ { avatar: luna, name: "Terra", ticker: "LUNA", //balance: terra.bank.balance(MNE_KEY_RANDOM.accAddress),// balance: "152.511184", address: MNE_KEY_RANDOM.accAddress }, ]; const Forms = () => { return ( Wallet Balance 개발중
Wallet Address {tableData.map((tdata, index) => ( {tdata.address} ))}
{tableData.map((tdata, index) => ( ))}
Assets Balance
{tdata.name}
{tdata.ticker}
{tdata.balance} Luna
Wallet Transfer 개발중
); }; export default Forms;
